      • fitToPhysicalBounds

        public static android.graphics.RectF fitToPhysicalBounds(android.graphics.RectF bounds,
                                                         android.graphics.RectF physicalBounds)
        Parameters:
        bounds - bounds of the object in units (1/72 inches).
        physicalBounds - physical bounds of the document (in inches).
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@2fc0cfac: bounds of the object converted to fit inside given physical bounds. Calculations are done taking into account that 1 unit is equals to 1/72 inches.
